description: This martini is a twist on traditional&nbsp;Eggnog that is not quite as sweet. If you can't find white chocolate liqueur, use clear creme de cacao or Frangelico. Hazelnut-flavored liqueurs are more expensive than other nut liqueurs and have a stronger flavor, so use sparingly with the nutmeg garnishâ€”a little goes a long way!
